name: Neptune - Acts Of Supremacy
description:
Neptune's 2008 debut album titled "Acts Of Supremacy", recorded by Ettore Rigotti (Disarmonia Mundi) and produced by Noisehead Records.

"Nine raging songs for the appreciators of the finest Melodic Death Metal, nine emotional episodes of rare intensity."

Tracklist:
01. Stereogram of Convulsion
02. Gearsouls' Supremacy
03. Sterile Gods
04. Machinegun Revolution
05. Dormant Slaves' Resurrection
06. Black Monolith Sunrise
07. Kevlar-B48
08. Cluster
09. Disequilibrium
10. Perfection & Failure (Japan bonus track)

Infos:
Recorded in summer 2006 by Neptune at dB Studios
Produced, engineered & mixed by Ettore Rigotti & Neptune at dB Studios
All music composed & arranged by Neptune, Andrea Mameli & Francesco Moro
All keyboards, programming & additional arrangements by Ettore Rigotti
Mastered by Alessandro Vanara at The Metal House
Artwork & layout by Mattia Nidini for East Asia Industries
(www.myspace.com/eastasiaindustries)
Band photos by Maurilio Zago (www.mauriliozago.net)

name: Neptune T-Shirt standard
description: Neptune standard T-shirt Black with cyborg white/gold logo. Available in M-L sizes.

name: Neptune FAN pack - cd & t-shirt
description: Neptune's debut album ACTS OF SUPREMACY + Neptune standard T-shirt Black with cyborg white/gold logo. Available in M-L sizes.

name: Neptune - Perfection & Failure
description:
Neptune's 2004 ep titled "Perfection And Failure".

Top demo on Rock Hard 04/06 (“Neptune is synonyme of melodic death metal played with a such a personality, that any comparison would be superfluous or absolutely misleading”).

Tracklist:
1. Introducing Apocalypse
2. Scratched Avantgarde Dream
3. Animal Trial Experiments
4. Breathing New Element
5. Unproject Holocaust
6. Angel Factory Avaria
7. Perfection And Failure (outro)

Infos:
PERFECTION AND FAILURE was registered during July/August 2004 at TOBACCO ROAD STUDIOS
Engineered, mixed and mastered by Mirko Nosari at TOBACCO ROAD STUDIOS
Produced by Neptune & BUNKKER PRODUCTIONS, co-produced by BENZOWORLD
